topics.body:
Don't get me wrong, when I go out in my dresses I get a lot of looks, and not all of them are innocent, but today some disgusting Hispanic guy was running his eyes up and down my body about two inches away from his wife, kid, and baby. That takes a special level of scum.

Also, some goth chick in Hot Topic was talking shit about my floral print behind me in line, but that was more funny than creepy. Guess I'm not punk rock enough.
